subject: Re: UI tests in Eclipse on MAC
msgSnippet: ... Ok, thanks anyway. Just to clarify though - it s not a plugin for Eclipse - it s an app built using the osgi framework. It s easy to reproduce - just
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Dale Emery <dale@...> wrote:
> Alas, I've never worked on an Eclipse plugin. The closest I've come was an RCP app, and at the time (several years ago) I couldn't find a good way to run through-the-UI tests for that.

Ok, thanks anyway. Just to clarify though - it's not a plugin for Eclipse - it's an app built using the osgi framework. It's easy to reproduce - just create a simple/empty plugin project on Eclipse on Mac and a Junit testcase that shows a frame and uses Robot - and run that as a plugin test.
